item.title: 正则相关
item.description: 语法一览图维基百科 截图地址 补充说明 分组非捕获组 sh `What is -?\d+(?: (?:plus|minus|divided by|multiplied by) -?\d+)*\?` 上面的正则表达式可以匹配 “What is 5?” “What is -10?” “What is 4 plus 5?” “What is 3 minus 2 divided by 1?” “What is -2 multiplied by -4 divided by
